public class ClockMover<T extends AbstractDoor & IHorizontalAxisAligned> extends WindmillMover<T>
Represents a BlockMover for Clocks.
Author:
Pim

    • angleDirectionMultiplier

      protected final int angleDirectionMultiplier
      This value should be either 1 or -1. It is used to change the sign of the angle based on which way the clock should rotate.
